verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Not by words of our own righteousness
That we could ever do

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
But by grace through faith:
It is the gift of God
Not of works
Lest any man should boast.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thank You, Lord, for so great a salvation
That we have in the blood of the Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Salvation is of the Lord.
It's not of me; it's not of you.
Salvation is of the Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus said, Come unto Me
Ye that labor and are heavy-laden,
And I will give you rest,
And ye shall find rest unto your souls.
Take My yoke upon you and learn of Me,
For I am lowly in heart.
For My yoke is easy,
And My burden is light.
And ye shall find rest unto your souls.
